channel.title: Server wont run,
channel.description: hey guys im really new to java coding, and yeah i downloaded a pi source, and client. i run the client, the the source, try and log in and it says "error connecting to server" and i have toouched anyone?

item.title: Server wont run,
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

Things to check:

Check the client IP, try changing them all to 127.0.0.1 or localhost,

Press your start button then go to accessories and open CMD, post the output of these commands:

ping 127.0.0.1:43594
ping 127.0.0.1:5555

Read full topic
